```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load libraries.
```{r}
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(leaflet)
library(scales)
library(ggmap)
```

Read in the data and look at a plot of it.
```{r}
## Read in shapefile using sf
ak_regions <- read_sf("data/shapefile_demo_data/ak_regions_simp.shp")

plot(ak_regions)  
```
